property.name: appender.stdout.layout.pattern
property.value: %highlight{[%p] - [%d{dd-MM-yyyy HH:mm:ss}] [%t] [%c] - %msg}{FATAL=red, ERROR=red bold, WARN=yellow bold, INFO=blue, DEBUG=green bold, TRACE=black}%n
